description:
Earth faces an unprecedented threat from an invasion by the mysterious Kiseichuu. The Kiseichuu feed on human sexual energy, also known as “H-energy”, and weaken the human population.

High school student Retto Enjou is a member of the hero group HXEROS, who fight together to save the earth from the Kiseichuu.

(Source: Funimation)

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

node.description:
__[Website](http://burnoutsyndromes.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/burnout_live) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXos4VWtLz_TNjLZy6F8mdw)__

__Introduction:__
BURNOUT SYNDROMES is a Japanese three-piece rock band under record label EPIC Records Japan (2016–), affiliated with the entertainment agency Handmade Music. 

__Biography:__
The band initially formed in 2005, due to Taiyu being heavily influenced by his brother to start a band. He would first invite Kazuumi, who went to the same school as Taiyu, then he invited Takuya, who was an avid player of drum mania at the local game center. This trio would eventually become the BURNOUT SYNDROMES as we know today.

__Members:__
- [Kazuumi Kumagai](https://anilist.co/staff/149247) (熊谷和海) – vocalist, guitarist, in-charge of lyrics and composition
- Taiyu Ishikawa (石川大裕) – bassist, chorus, M&C
- Takuya Hirose (廣瀬拓哉) – drummer, chorus

__Height:__ 165 cm
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=82) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/31333.html)

A voice actor currently affiliated with I'm Enterprise. He was honored at the 6th Seiyu Awards as Best New Actor in 2012 and the 10th Seiyu Awards as Best Lead Actor in 2016.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
• Xiao (Genshin Impact)
• Ryker (Rune Factory 5)
• Vision Driver, Laser Raise Riser, and Suel (Kamen Rider Geats)
• Law (Tales Of Arise)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Gin_and_staff) | [Website](https://bustedrose.com/)
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/133009/)._
[Website (profile)](http://studio-naya.co.jp/creators/m_masuda.html)
[Twitter](https://x.com/ton_tsutchy)

__Nickname:__ Kuma-san (くまさん) __Favorite Artists:__ [BUMP OF CHICKEN](https://anilist.co/staff/109225/Bump-Of-Chicken), [ASIAN KUNG-FU GENERATION](https://anilist.co/staff/100251/Asian-KungFu-Generation) __Favorite Song:__ [Kyou made Soshite Ashita kara](https://anidb.net/song/54538) from [Crayon Shin-chan: Arashi o Yobu Mouretsu! Otona Teikoku Gyakushuu](https://anilist.co/anime/2450/Crayon-Shinchan-Movie-09-Arashi-wo-Yobu-Mouretsu-Otona-Teikoku-no-Gyakushuu/), released in 2001. __ Favorite Color:__ Red __Favorite Hobbies:__ Manga, Games __Introduction:__ Kazuumi Kumagai is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger, guitarist and member of the band Burnout Syndromes. __Biography:__ When he was in the first year of junior high school, he was invited to play in a band. He accepted the offer and started listening to music, writing lyrics and composing music. After joining the band he was told to play the guitar by band member [Ishikawa Taiyu](https://twitter.com/BURNOUTSYNDROME), which led him take on the guitar and be in charge of vocals in the band. On May 4, 2005 the pair Kazuumi and Taiyu decided they needed another member, so Taiyu invited [Hirose Takuya](https://twitter.com/hirose_burnout) to be the final member of the line-up for the rock-band BURNOUT SYNDROMES. Hirose at the time had been immersed at the local game center playing "DrumMania", so he saw this as an opportunity and accepted the offer from Taiyu. After this they proceeded to officially form the band on the same date. In 2010, they temporarily suspended band activities to focus on taking exams. Kazuumi alongside Taiyu and Takuya made their initial major debut as BURNOUT SYNDROMES with the song "[FLY HIGH!!](https://anidb.net/song/84120)", which was used as the second opening theme to the [Mitsunaka Susumu](https://anilist.co/staff/113823/Susumu-Mitsunaka) directed second season of the anime _[Haikyuu!!](https://anilist.co/anime/20992/Haikyuu-2/) 2_, otherwise known as _HAIKYU!! 2nd Season_. __Trivia:__ - He can't see his face because of his bangs. - Mentions that he usually sleeps during holidays (Source: [Wikipedia (Kazuumi Kumagai)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%86%8A%E8%B0%B7%E5%92%8C%E6%B5%B7), edited | [Wikipedia (BURNOUT SYNDROMES)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/BURNOUT_SYNDROMES), edited)

__Nickname:__ Kuma-san (くまさん) __Favorite Artists:__ [BUMP OF CHICKEN](https://anilist.co/staff/109225/Bump-Of-Chicken), [ASIAN KUNG-FU GENERATION](https://anilist.co/staff/100251/Asian-KungFu-Generation) __Favorite Song:__ [Kyou made Soshite Ashita kara](https://anidb.net/song/54538) from [Crayon Shin-chan: Arashi o Yobu Mouretsu! Otona Teikoku Gyakushuu](https://anilist.co/anime/2450/Crayon-Shinchan-Movie-09-Arashi-wo-Yobu-Mouretsu-Otona-Teikoku-no-Gyakushuu/), released in 2001. __ Favorite Color:__ Red __Favorite Hobbies:__ Manga, Games __Introduction:__ Kazuumi Kumagai is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger, guitarist and member of the band Burnout Syndromes. __Biography:__ When he was in the first year of junior high school, he was invited to play in a band. He accepted the offer and started listening to music, writing lyrics and composing music. __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/K_Inoue_5420)__

__Date of Birth:__ ?? ??, 1993
__Graduated:__ Keio University

__Kaoru Inoue__ is a Japanese keyboardist, composer and arranger.
Affiliated with REAL-T.
[Synchronkartei](https://www.synchronkartei.de/sprecher/1211/2) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/daniel_schlauch)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/FARfromani) | [Blog](https://farfromanimation.com/)

Freelance Translator & Interpreter, Production Manager & Animation Blogger. President of the animation studio Buta Productions. Also known as the animation producer of the Otaku-Vs original series Otachan!, a foreign short animated series. Often collaborates with [Blou](https://anilist.co/staff/213397/Blou).
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
Representative director of Tops.
General Manager of the animation business department at [Tokyo MX](https://anilist.co/studio/6259/).
